title: United States Code, 2000, Title 26: Internal Revenue, Sections 1001-End
description: The 2000 edition of the United States Code represents the 75th anniversary of the Code.  It is the 13th edition of the Code.  This edition is a consolidation and codification of the general and permanent laws of the United States in force on January 1, 2001.  It incorporates the legislation enacted subsequent to the 1994 edition and up to the end of the 106th Congress.  It may be cited as “U.S.C. 2000 ed.”
author: Office of the Law Revision Counsel House (U.S.)
